def Load(widget): import clr clr.AddReference("Benner.Corporativo.Definicoes") from Benner.Corporativo.Definicoes.Contratos import CNContrato
podeAlterar = CNContrato.PodeAlterarFilialFormulario(widget.Entity.ContratoHandle.Value)
widget.View.Commands["New"].Visible = podeAlterar widget.View.Commands["Edit"].Visible = podeAlterar widget.View.Commands["Delete"].Visible = podeAlterar
